result.name: markhams-triangle-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Markhams Triangle rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 
2015): Cruise: cend0812 Date: 30th Apr - 5th May 2012 Data collected: MB 
Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 80% MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 
80% SS Coverage: None acquired to date Video and Stills Samples to date: 21 
video transects; 222 stills analysed PSA Samples to date: 50 Infauna Samples 
to date: 50

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
